name: php app framework
body:
### What it does.
This is a pretty lightweight and generic framework for building out a simple PHP application.  It provides the following tools:

+ class autoloading
+ request handlers
 + routing
  + controller handlers
  + view handlers
  + less css handler

### Authors and Contributors
Brad Harris (@bmharris)

### Support or Contact
I don't offer any support for this, so use it at your own risk.  I'm happy to look at pull requests though.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
